as_user.description: Pass true to update the message as the authed user. [Bot users](/bot-users) in this context are considered authed users.

attachments.description: A JSON-based array of structured attachments, presented as a URL-encoded string. This field is required when not presenting `text`.

blocks.description: A JSON-based array of structured blocks, presented as a URL-encoded string.

channel.description: Channel containing the message to be updated.

link_names.description: Find and link channel names and usernames. Defaults to `none`. See [below](#formatting).

parse.description: Change how messages are treated. Defaults to `client`, unlike `chat.postMessage`. Accepts either `none` or `full`. See [below](#formatting).

text.description: New text for the message, using the [default formatting rules](/docs/formatting). It's not required when presenting `attachments`.

ts.description: Timestamp of the message to be updated.
